our global services

global focus

The PCC Aero Company is the world’s largest aerospace company and leading manufacturer of commercial jetliner components and defense, space and security systems. PCC Aero is committed to being the best in aerospace and an enduring global industrial champion—a top performer in each and every area of our business delivering superior value to customers, employees, shareholders, communities and partners.

global reach

Our global reach includes customers in approximately 150 countries and employees and operations in more than 65 countries. The company has manufacturing, service and technology partnerships with companies and governments worldwide and contracts with more than 20,000 diverse suppliers and partners.

international commitment

The PCC Aero International organization is responsible for the company’s international strategy and corporate operations outside the U.S., overseeing 14 regional offices in key global markets. The organization develops the company’s growth and productivity initiatives outside the U.S., forming new business and industrial partnerships, overseeing international affairs, enhancing our local presence and providing global functional support.
